name: The Tavistock Occasional Table - Davidson
description: This little beauty is the most versatile piece from our occasional collection, the Tavistock stands proud and elegant in three smart sizes, it is the perfect size to fit any space. Style together as a trio or dot around your living room to display your favorite accents in style. Clean and simple, you can't go wrong with this design, the tabletop, which can be square or rectangular, stands on four tapered legs, creating a look that is modern and stylish. The main body of the Tavistock can be finished as a high-gloss or satin sheen with any of DAVIDSONs luxury timber finishes. A defining characteristic of the table is the beautiful inlaid shagreen to the tabletop, making this little gem one of our most luxurious pieces from the occasional collection.
